duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide installation, preventative and corrective maintenance on building machinery, equipment, physical structures, pipe and electrical systems.
Maintain and make repairs to building, furniture and other general maintenance work including carpentry, sheet rocking, painting, wiring, and electrical components.
Perform preventative maintenance on facility systems including HVAC, plumbing, compressors, etc.
Assist in repair of machine shop and plant equipment.
Requisition, buy, and pick up maintenance supplies from local vendors.
Maintain neat and orderly work area to ensure efficiency and compliance with safety requirements.
Meet all quality, quantity, and established manufacturing practices to satisfy customer requirements.
Maintain a daily log (Notes Database) of jobs/tasks completed.
Comply with the Incident Command System adopted by the company.

education_certification.credential: Vocational school classes or education/experience equivalent (construction, wiring, mechanical, plumbing, etc.)
